G1_package_json_exists.notes: `package.json` exists with Next.js scripts and dependencies.

G3_build_succeeds.notes: `npm run build` succeeded and generated static routes including `/matrix`.

G4_matrix_route_exists.notes: Route file exists at `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:4` and build output lists `/matrix`.

G5_project_files_exist.notes: Found 4 markdown project files: `PRJ-001.md` through `PRJ-004.md` under `_content/projects/`.

G6_chart_library_installed.notes: `recharts` is declared in `package.json` dependencies and imported in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:11-20`.

G7_normalization_logic_exists.notes: Normalization implemented as `normalizeScore` with clamp + scale (x10) in `src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:27-35`; used in pipeline at `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:58-60`.

G8_quadrant_logic_exists.notes: Quadrant assignment logic implemented in `src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:57-75` and invoked at `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:60`.

G9_chart_renders_data.notes: Scatter plot maps transformed data points (`chartData`) and renders via `<Scatter data={chartData}>` in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:58-67,114-138`.

G10_tooltips_implemented.notes: Custom tooltip is wired through Recharts `<Tooltip content={<MatrixTooltip />}>` in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:112` with implementation in `src/components/matrix/MatrixTooltip.tsx:28-95`.

A1_data_population.evidence: Seeded files exist and are valid: `_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:1-23`, `_content/projects/PRJ-002.md:1-23`, `_content/projects/PRJ-003.md:1-23`, `_content/projects/PRJ-004.md:1-23`.
A1_data_population.notes: Uses the 4 seeded projects correctly; no additional projects added.

A2_score_normalization.evidence: `normalizeScore` clamps [0,10], multiplies by 10, rounds in `src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:27-35`; pipeline uses it in `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:58-59`; seeded mapping test verifies 8.6->86 and 3.2->32 in `tests/integration/content/transformProjects.test.ts:151-153`.
A2_score_normalization.notes: Implemented as a reusable pipeline step with edge-case clamping.

A3_quadrant_assignment.evidence: Dedicated utility function `assignQuadrant` with threshold booleans in `src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:57-75`; called from transform pipeline `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:60`.
A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Cleanly separated from UI and readable; thresholds are hardcoded rather than parameterized.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.evidence: Recharts scatter plot uses X/Y domains [0,100], labeled axes, grid, and mapped points in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:77-110,114-138`; quadrant background zones shown in `src/components/matrix/QuadrantOverlay.tsx:30-64`.
A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Well-rendered matrix with clear axes and visual quadrant context.

A5_tooltip_implementation.evidence: Tooltip includes title, quadrant badge, impact, effort, and ROI in `src/components/matrix/MatrixTooltip.tsx:63-87`; integrated at `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:112`.
A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Exceeds minimum field requirements with useful extra context.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Matrix pipeline separation: markdown parsing in `src/lib/content/loadProjects.ts:37-70`, validation + normalize + quadrant assignment in `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:51-91`, route-level loading in `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:15-44`, rendering in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:75-142`.
A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Strong parse->validate->transform->render architecture for the matrix feature.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: Core matrix functionality is strong and production-usable; the main gap versus top score is limited data breadth beyond seeded content and non-parameterized quadrant thresholds.

B1_project_setup.evidence: Build and install succeed (`npm install`, `npm run build`); strict TS + path aliases in `tsconfig.json:6,20-22`; scripts in `package.json`; `.gitignore` excludes `.next`/`out` in `.gitignore:77-80`.
B1_project_setup.notes: Professional Next.js setup with strong defaults and clean configuration.

B2_routing_navigation.evidence: Primary routes implemented in `src/app/page.tsx`, `src/app/matrix/page.tsx`, `src/app/roadmap/page.tsx`, `src/app/projects/page.tsx`, `src/app/projects/[id]/page.tsx`; global nav links in `src/components/layout/AppHeader.tsx:15-45`.
B2_routing_navigation.notes: Comprehensive route coverage and navigation; lacks active-link state system expected for top score.

B3_type_safety.evidence: Runtime schema validation with Zod in `src/lib/validation/projectSchema.ts:95-124`; inferred type at `src/lib/validation/projectSchema.ts:129`; strict compiler mode in `tsconfig.json:6`; no `any` usage found in `src/` and `tests/`.
B3_type_safety.notes: High type rigor across validation and domain model.

B4_data_layer.evidence: File loading/parsing in `src/lib/content/loadProjects.ts:37-70`; config loading in `src/lib/content/loadConfig.ts:61-86`; transformation and validation orchestration in `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:131-206`.
B4_data_layer.notes: Well-structured and validated data flow; no explicit build artifact export layer (e.g., master_data output).

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Technical foundations are robust, typed, and build-clean with well-organized routing and data flow.

C1_visual_design.evidence: Consistent Tailwind styling across matrix/dashboard in `src/components/matrix/MatrixPageClient.tsx:60-121` and `src/app/page.tsx:71-175`; polished cards/modals in `src/components/matrix/ProjectModal.tsx:83-321`.
C1_visual_design.notes: Visually cohesive and intentional, though not at premium-design level.

C2_responsive_design.evidence: Responsive classes used broadly (e.g., `sm/md/lg` breakpoints in `src/app/page.tsx:73-75,94,125`, `src/components/matrix/MatrixPageWithFilters.tsx:53-63`, `src/components/matrix/ProjectModal.tsx:77,313-317`); chart container is responsive in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:77`.

C3_interactivity.evidence: Matrix hover/click interactions in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:116-124`; modal interaction and Escape handling in `src/components/matrix/ProjectModal.tsx:20-35`; live filter updates in `src/components/matrix/MatrixFilters.tsx:29-42`.
C3_interactivity.notes: Interactive behavior is smooth and meaningful.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.evidence: Route loading skeletons in `src/app/loading.tsx:1-10`, `src/app/matrix/loading.tsx:1-10`, `src/app/projects/loading.tsx:1-15`, `src/app/roadmap/loading.tsx:1-10`; empty states in `src/components/matrix/MatrixPageWithFilters.tsx:63-77`; app error boundary in `src/app/error.tsx:3-27`.
C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Thoughtful handling exists across happy and non-happy paths.

C5_design_token_usage.evidence: Tenant tokens are defined in `_content/config.json:8-18` and typed in `src/lib/content/loadConfig.ts:26-37`, but UI mostly uses hardcoded Tailwind/hex values (e.g., `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:30-35`, `src/app/page.tsx:142-170`).
C5_design_token_usage.notes: Minimal practical integration of config-driven branding in runtime UI.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: UI quality is solid and responsive with good interaction patterns; the biggest gap is dynamic, config-driven theming/token integration.

D1_schema_adherence.evidence: Frontmatter structure in `_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:2-22` matches validated schema in `src/lib/validation/projectSchema.ts:95-124` with runtime enforcement via `ProjectSchema.parse` in `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:56`.
D1_schema_adherence.notes: Schema is fully enforced programmatically with strong validation.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.evidence: PRD-aligned thresholds in `src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:41-45,57-75`; seeded-project correctness verified in tests `tests/integration/content/transformProjects.test.ts:141-199`; quadrant overlays rendered in `src/components/matrix/QuadrantOverlay.tsx:30-64`.
D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Logic and visual labeling align with expected quadrant definitions.

D3_route_structure.notes: Route coverage matches and exceeds core PRD routing requirements.

D4_specification_details.evidence: X-axis uses effort and Y-axis uses impact in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:60-61,81-105`; scatter plot used in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:77-78`; Quick Wins top-left labeling in `src/components/matrix/QuadrantOverlay.tsx:31-36`.
D4_specification_details.notes: Key matrix details are correct; not all additional PRD polish details are implemented (e.g., cmd+k trigger behavior).

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: PRD compliance for matrix logic, schema handling, and route structure is very strong.

E1_separation_of_concerns.evidence: Overall layered structure across `src/app/` routes, `src/components/` UI modules, and `src/lib/` domain logic (e.g., `src/lib/projects/searchProjects.ts`, `src/lib/gantt/groupProjects.ts`, `src/components/dashboard/MetricCard.tsx`, `src/app/projects/ProjectLibraryClient.tsx`).
E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Clear module boundaries and responsibilities across the codebase.

E2_readability_naming.evidence: Domain-appropriate naming and focused functions, e.g., `normalizeScore`, `assignQuadrant` (`src/lib/governance/matrix.ts:27,57`), `loadAndTransformProjects` (`src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:192`), `applyMatrixFilters` (`src/lib/filters/applyMatrixFilters.ts:26`).
E2_readability_naming.notes: Code is consistently readable and self-documenting.

E3_error_handling.evidence: Defensive checks and explicit errors in loaders (`src/lib/content/loadProjects.ts:44-46`, `src/lib/content/loadConfig.ts:64-85`), transformation error capture in `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts:104-121,165-173`, and UI error boundary at `src/app/error.tsx:3-27`.
E3_error_handling.notes: Robust handling overall, though user-facing boundary currently exposes raw `error.message`.

E4_dependency_choices.evidence: Dependencies are PRD-aligned and focused: `recharts`, `gray-matter`, `zod`, `fuse.js` in `package.json`; direct usage in `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx:11-20`, `src/lib/content/loadProjects.ts:14`, `src/lib/validation/projectSchema.ts:8`, `src/lib/projects/searchProjects.ts:7`.
E4_dependency_choices.notes: Appropriate, minimal library set with clear purpose.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Code quality is high with strong readability and architecture; minor polish opportunities remain in user-facing error presentation.

F1_dashboard.evidence: Dashboard computes portfolio metrics and renders multiple widgets in `src/app/page.tsx:31-139` using `MetricCard`, `PhaseDistribution`, `StatusBreakdown`, and `ActivityFeed`.
F1_dashboard.notes: Comprehensive dashboard implementation with real calculations from project data.

F2_additional_pages.evidence: Meaningful additional routes implemented: roadmap timeline (`src/app/roadmap/page.tsx` + `src/app/roadmap/RoadmapClient.tsx`), project library (`src/app/projects/page.tsx` + `src/app/projects/ProjectLibraryClient.tsx`), and project detail (`src/app/projects/[id]/page.tsx`).
F2_additional_pages.notes: Near-complete feature surface beyond the required matrix page.

F3_search_filtering.evidence: Fuzzy search powered by Fuse.js with weighted keys in `src/lib/projects/searchProjects.ts:10-21`; matrix filters with URL state in `src/components/matrix/MatrixFilters.tsx:29-46`; project library filter/sort/search composition in `src/app/projects/ProjectLibraryClient.tsx:58-63`.
F3_search_filtering.notes: Strong multi-dimensional search/filtering; does not implement full cmd+k style trigger workflow.

F4_creative_additions.evidence: Includes a non-required Gantt visualization (`src/components/roadmap/GanttChart.tsx`) and global header search (`src/components/layout/GlobalSearch.tsx:12-83`) beyond core must-haves.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Bonus scope is broad and thoughtfully implemented, especially dashboard and roadmap extensions.

G1_prioritization.evidence: Journal shows must-have-first planning and phased execution (`JOURNAL.md:52-90,77-83`), then layered bonus expansion after matrix completion (`JOURNAL.md:185-203`).
G1_prioritization.notes: Execution sequence demonstrates strong prioritization discipline.

G2_pr_description.evidence: Submission documentation is comprehensive with summary, verification, compliance mapping, limitations, and tradeoffs in `docs/PR-DESCRIPTION.md:7-134,149-186`.
G2_pr_description.notes: High-quality communication of what was built and why.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Decision-making and communication quality are both excellent and well evidenced in-repo.

H1_commit_cadence.evidence: `git log` shows well over 6 incremental commits across phases (e.g., `d443907`, `4f602bf`, `5b0a42a`, `c997b6e`, `ed186dd`, `b366b2e`).
H1_commit_cadence.notes: Sustained commit cadence with iterative development.

H2_message_quality.evidence: Commit messages are descriptive but mostly what-focused (`feat: add...`, `fix: adjust...`) in recent history.
H2_message_quality.notes: Generally clear messages; limited explanation of rationale in commit titles.

H3_logical_progression.evidence: Commit history progresses from matrix implementation to tests, then dashboard/filters, then extended features and docs (e.g., `d443907` -> `4f602bf` -> `5b0a42a` -> docs commits).
H3_logical_progression.notes: Work sequence reflects structured build-up of functionality.

top_strengths: Strong end-to-end matrix pipeline (parse -> validate -> normalize -> quadrant -> render) with clean separation across `src/lib/content/loadProjects.ts`, `src/lib/content/transformProjects.ts`, and `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx`.
High PRD fidelity for quadrant logic and route coverage, including verified seeded mappings in `tests/integration/content/transformProjects.test.ts:141-199` and complete app routes under `src/app/`.

Excellent feature ambition and execution beyond must-haves, including dashboard (`src/app/page.tsx`), roadmap Gantt (`src/app/roadmap/RoadmapClient.tsx`), and project library/search (`src/app/projects/ProjectLibraryClient.tsx`, `src/lib/projects/searchProjects.ts`).
top_weaknesses: Design-token integration is weak at runtime: tenant branding exists in `_content/config.json`, but UI styling remains largely hardcoded in component files (e.g., `src/components/matrix/MatrixChart.tsx`, `src/app/page.tsx`).
Matrix dataset is limited to the seeded 4 projects only, which caps demonstration of broader data modeling and realism for A1.

Top-tier navigation polish is incomplete (no global active-link states/systematic breadcrumb pattern), despite broad route coverage in `src/components/layout/AppHeader.tsx` and `src/app/projects/[id]/page.tsx`.
standout_moments: The candidate implemented and tested exact seeded-project quadrant outcomes with explicit numeric assertions (`tests/integration/content/transformProjects.test.ts:151-199`), reducing ambiguity around core correctness.
Submission communication quality is unusually thorough for an assessment repo (`docs/PR-DESCRIPTION.md`).
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This is a high-functioning product-minded frontend/full-stack candidate with strong implementation rigor on core requirements and thoughtful bonus expansion. They show strong architecture instincts, testing discipline, and delivery execution. The main development area is making white-label theming truly config-driven instead of largely static styling.
